 2003-17172003-11-04,  TC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of PAUL CANTOR of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Mickey L. Akavak, whose term has expired.
